survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and purchasing habits regarding organic food products.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase organic food products?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase organic food products?

questions.question_text: Which types of organic food products do you typically purchase? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE), with an optional open-text field for 'Other'
